multiple_choice.question: She ___ to school every day.
multiple_choice.explanation: The verb 'go' in present simple third person singular is 'goes'.

multiple_choice.question: I ___ happy today.
multiple_choice.explanation: Use 'am' for first person singular in present continuous or simple present.

multiple_choice.question: They ___ eating lunch.
multiple_choice.explanation: 'They' is plural, so use 'are' for present continuous.

multiple_choice.question: He ___ a doctor.
We ___ playing soccer.
The cat ___ on the mat.

My friends ___ coming over.
The book ___ interesting.
Dogs ___ loyal animals.

Birds ___ flying in the sky.
What is the plural of 'child'?
What is the past tense of 'eat'?
What is a pronoun?
What is the comparative of 'big'?
What is the superlative of 'small'?
What is a preposition?
multiple_choice.explanation: A preposition shows relationship of position.

multiple_choice.question: Which word is a comparative adjective: bigger, big, biggest?
What is the past tense of 'go'?
Which is a superlative: faster, fast, fastest?
What is the past participle of 'write'?
What is the present perfect of 'eat'?
What is the future tense of 'be'?
What is the passive voice of 'They build houses'?
What is the conditional of 'If I have money'?
multiple_choice.explanation: Second conditional uses past tense for unreal present.

multiple_choice.question: What is the gerund of 'run'?
What is the infinitive of 'to go'?
multiple_choice.explanation: Base form; 'to' makes it full infinitive.

multiple_choice.question: What is the past continuous of 'sing'?
What is the future perfect of 'finish'?
multiple_choice.explanation: Will have + past participle for completed future action.

multiple_choice.question: What is the subjunctive mood in 'I suggest that he go'?
multiple_choice.explanation: Base form in subjunctive for suggestions.

multiple_choice.question: What is reported speech for 'He said, "I am tired."'?
options: He said that he was tired.
He said that he is tired.
He says that he is tired.
He said that he is tired.
multiple_choice.answer: He said that he was tired.

multiple_choice.question: What is the causative form of 'have' in 'I had my car repaired'?

What is the indirect object in 'Give me the book'?
What is the participle in 'Having eaten, he left'?
What is the appositive in 'My friend John is here'?
What is the idiom 'kick the bucket' mean?
What is the antonym of 'big'?
What is the synonym of 'happy'?
What is the synonym of 'big'?
What is the antonym of 'happy'?
What is the synonym of 'small'?

fill_blank.question: If I ___ rich, I would travel. (conditional)
They have ___ here for two hours.
The cake ___ baked by my mother. (is)
If she ___ here, she would help. (be)
fill_blank.explanation: Subjunctive 'were' for all subjects in unreal conditions.

fill_blank.question: By next year, I ___ my degree. (will have finished)
fill_blank.explanation: Future perfect for action completed before another future time.

fill_blank.question: I recommend that he ___ the job. (take)
She told me that she ___ happy. (was)
This is the house ___ I grew up. (that)
Paris, ___ capital of France, is beautiful. (the)
Live simply so that others may ___. (simply live)

sentence_completion.question: Correct the paragraph: She don't like apples. She has two cats.
sentence_completion.answer: She doesn't like apples. She has two cats.

sentence_completion.answer: He goes to school every day. He likes math.

sentence_completion.answer: I have eaten dinner. I am full now.

sentence_completion.answer: She has gone home. She is tired.

sentence_completion.answer: He will go tomorrow. He is excited.
